description.exang: Chest pain during exercise (1 = Yes, 0 = No).
description.oldpeak: ST depression indicating heart stress level.

insight_1: Certain combinations of chest pain type and exercise-induced angina showed disease presence as high as 80.6%, while some combinations showed as low as 10.6%.
insight_2: Patients with higher ST depression and more blocked vessels had disease rates up to 86.2%, compared to as low as 5.6% in lower-risk groups.
insight_3: When heart rate and ST depression levels were both high-risk, disease occurrence reached 76.3%, whereas low-risk combinations dropped to 18.5%.
